metadata.title: CVE-2017-8069 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: drivers/net/usb/rtl8150.c in the Linux kernel 4.9.x before 4.9.11 interactsincorrectly with the CONFIG_VMAP_STACK option, which allows local users tocause a denial of service (system crash or memory corruption) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact by leveraging use of more than one virtualpage for a DMA scatterlist.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
